alert.note: Alert for Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 30 at 12:01AM MDT until May 30 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 101 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lewis And Clark State Recreation Area, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lewis And Clark State Recreation Area around 110 AM CDT. Yankton around 115 AM CDT. Utica around 120 AM CDT. Mission Hill around 125 AM CDT. Volin around 130 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Lewis And Clark State Recreation Area and Gayville. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
